name: create-agent
description: Create a new agent for identified capability gaps

trigger.description: Create a new agent based on specific requirements

workflow.name: Agent Creation Workflow
workflow.description: Systematic creation of new agents with validation and testing

agents.task: Design and create a new agent based on user-specified requirements
agents.purpose: Create new specialized agent for identified capability gap

agents.task: Validate the new agent design for practical value and system integration
agents.purpose: Ensure new agent is valuable and won't conflict with existing agents
agents.expected_output: Approval or modification recommendations for the new agent

phases.name: Testing & Integration
phases.condition: Only proceed if system-evaluator approves the agent design

agents.task: Test the new agent for functionality and integration with existing system
agents.purpose: Validate new agent works properly and integrates well

agents.task: Integrate approved and tested agent into the system and update documentation
agents.purpose: Deploy new agent and update system documentation

usage: Specify the capability gap or requirements for the new agent when using this command
